pr_title: IGNITE-12993: Initial ASF infra integration configuration.

timeline.message: IGNITE-12993: Initial ASF infra integration configuration.

timeline.bodyText: Do we remove Hadoop support from Ignite?
timeline.author: Mmuzaf
timeline.diffHunk:

+github:
+  description: "Apache Ignite"
+  homepage: https://ignite.apache.org/
+  labels:
+    - distributed-sql-database
+    - iot
+    - osgi
+    - network-client
+    - ignite
+    - data-management-platform
+    - big-data
+    - cloud
+    - database
+    - network-server
+    - hadoop

replies.bodyText: These are the current labels of Apache Ignite repository on github
replies.author: xtern

replies.bodyText: IGFS and Ignite Hadoop Accelerator were discontinued, but Ignite can still be used to speed up Hadoop, as described on this page: https://ignite.apache.org/use-cases/hadoop-acceleration.html
replies.author: xtern

replies.bodyText:
Maxim, I would also add the following labels:

cache
in-memory computing
in-memory database
replies.author: dmagda
